Package org.forgerock.openidm.selfservice.util

Class RequirementsBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.openidm.selfservice.util.RequirementsBuilder
public final class RequirementsBuilder extends Object
Helper class to assist with the building of requirements.
